sentence.Network_en: Sometimes, such paintings depict not only Buddha but Hindu deities such as Shiva, Ganesha and Surya.
sentence.Network_cn: 有时候, 这样的绘画不仅仅是描绘佛陀,还描绘印度教的神,例如湿婆 、 甘尼萨和苏利耶.
